text: 3:9 Rom 16:25; 1 Korin 2:7; Efesus 1:9; Kolosi 1:16; 1:20; Hibru 1:2God biziba bar dar ingari, egha faragha zuir dughiaba uan nɨghnɨzir mogomem men ghuara. Egha iza datɨrɨghɨn a uan nɨghnɨzir mogomem aghurasa, ingangarir kam na ganɨngi, eghtɨ kɨ gumazamiziba bar me damutɨ me God damuamin araziba bar dagh fogham.
